description: ...but it would be great if there were some presets already too choose from

Documentation at extensions.gnome.org/extension/1212/tlp-switcher/ suggests using tlp-stat which is not installed with the switcher - the github docs are no better. No indication of how to manually construct the config file either
summary: Poor - very sparse and inaccurate documentation

description: Si eres user de portátil esta app es conveniente ya que permite administrar distintos modos de energia tal como se hace nativamente en windows, 'performance', 'ahorro', etc.
